Text:
It turns out I have already uploaded this file here.
Ooops, sorry guys.
Hi Auge, could you please upload Spirit of the Beehive? Pleeeeeease! Sorry for the constant pestering :D
baybeh, There is a full dvd Criterion of Spirit of the Beehive available on both TPB, and Demonoid. I downloaded it some time ago and the quality is very good. Take care.

If therre is already a good DVD up here I can focus on harder to find things.

Let me know if this does not work for you and I will make mine avalable.

Hi Auge and Waikiki2008, thanks for the response. The full Criterion dvd, the one with all the extras, on tpb is not being seeded --> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4003689

Also, Auge, could you upload the Criterion dvd's for The Red Shoes (1948) and Hitchcock's Notorious, if you have them? Many thanks.
